name: Agriculture
description: Private entities specialized in the growth, culture, transport and transformation of plants or livestock for food.

subsectors.name: Culture
subsectors.description: Private and public entities involved in creating, producting, and distributing goods and services that are cultural in nature, or protecting it.

subsectors.name: Sports
subsectors.description: Private and public entities involved in producing, organizing, promoting  goods and services associated with sports.

subsectors.name: Movies industry
subsectors.description: Private and public entities involved in filmmaking.

name: Education and research
description: Public or private entities operating to facilitate learning and acquiring knowledge and skills and all research activities.

subsectors.name: Universities
subsectors.description: Institutions delivering high level education and research sanctionned by academic degrees.

subsectors.name: Schools
subsectors.description: Primary and secondary schools or equivalent.

subsectors.name: Think tanks
subsectors.description: Research institute/center and organization which performs research concerning mostly social sciences.

subsectors.name: Scientific research centers & Laboratories
subsectors.description: Research institute and laboratories wich performs research concerning scientific topics.

name: Energy
description: Public and private entities operating to extract, store, transport and process fuel, entities managing energy plants and energy storage and distribution and entities managing fuel waste.

subsectors.name: Electricity
subsectors.description: Public or private entities involved in the storage, transport and distribution of electricity to end customers.

subsectors.name: Nuclear
subsectors.description: Civilian entities involved in the extraction and transport of nuclear fuel, civilian entities operating nuclear plants for civilian purposes, entities processing nuclear waste.

subsectors.name: Gas
subsectors.description: Public or private entities involved in exploration, extraction, refining, transporting and marketing of natural gas products.

subsectors.name: Oil
subsectors.description: The oil industry includes the global processes of exploration, extraction, refining, transporting (often by oil tankers and pipelines), and marketing of petroleum products.

subsectors.name: Renewable energies
subsectors.description: Public and private entities involved in the production of electricity based on renewable ressources.

subsectors.name: Aviation
subsectors.description: All entities transporting people or goods by plane, managing or exploiting airports and structures, trafic authorities and plane manufacturers. Includes all civilian space activities.

subsectors.name: Rail
subsectors.description: Public and private entities managing rail infrastructures, rail transportation, exploiting intelligent rail transport systems and the rail industry

subsectors.name: Maritime
subsectors.description: All entities transporting people or good by naval means, managing or exploiting naval structures (ports), naval manufactures and trafic authorities.

subsectors.name: Road
subsectors.description: Public and private entities managing road infrastructures, road transportation, exploiting intelligent transport systems and the automotive industry.

name: Defense
description: Public and private organizations involved in the production of weapons, planning and conducting military operations.

subsectors.name: Ministry of defense
subsectors.description: Includes the military and all defense related-space activities.

subsectors.name: Defense contractors
subsectors.description: Private entities providing products or services in support of military or intelligence capacities.

subsectors.name: Research and development
subsectors.description: R&D for defense or military purposes.

subsectors.name: Banking institutions
subsectors.description: Includes Central Banks.

name: Diplomacy
description: Public or private entities which are actors of or involved in international relations activities.

subsectors.name: Ministries of foreign affairs
subsectors.description: Governmental entities in charge of the diplomatic actions.

subsectors.name: Specialized think tanks
subsectors.description: Research institutes specialized in policy and advocacy on diplomatic subjects.

subsectors.name: Intergovernmental organizations (IGOs)
subsectors.description: International organizations made up primarily of sovereign states and involved in setting international agendas and policies.

name: Government and administrations
description: Civilian administrations or institutions, including parliamentary institutions and local administrations.

subsectors.name: Central administration and Ministries
subsectors.description: Exclude Ministries of Foreign Affairs and Ministries of Defense

subsectors.name: Local administrations
subsectors.description: Public administrations administring a local territory under the global authority of a central governement.

subsectors.name: Parliamentary chambers
subsectors.description: Legislative bodies of a governement.

name: Health
description: Public and private entities involved in all services and manufacturing of good related to public health.

subsectors.name: Healthcare services
subsectors.description: Hospital and other direct medical practice activities.

subsectors.name: Pharmacy and drugs manufacturing
subsectors.description: Public and private entities involved in producing medicinal products and drugs.

subsectors.name: Healthcare research
subsectors.description: Public and private research centers focusing on Health improvement.

name: Hospitality
description: Private structures involved in receiving and entertaining people.

subsectors.name: Tourism industry
subsectors.description: All private entities in the tourism industry except for transportations companies.

name: Technologies
description: Private entities related to the research, development, manufacturing and distribution of electronics, softwares, computers and products related to information technologies.

name: Manufacturing
description: Private entities specialized in the transformation of raw materials into manufactured goods, except for transportation and technologies.

name: Retail
description: Private entities transporting and selling consumer goods and services to customers through multiple channels of distribution to earn a profit.

name: Telecommunications
description: Private and public entities involved in the production, transportand dissemination of information and communication signals.

subsectors.name: Medias and audiovisual
subsectors.description: Communication outlets and people working in these outlets used to deliver information by print, broadcast or Internet.

name: Consulting
description: Private organism providing expert advice in a specific field to external entities.

name: Mining
description: All activities related to the extraction, transport and sell of mineral and metal reserves.

name: Water
description: All public and private structures involved in the collection, transport and distribution of water for consumption purposes.

name: Civil society
description: Non-governemental entities, or individuals independant of governements, which may be linked by interests or activities aiming at promoting the interests and the will of citizens.

subsectors.name: Non governmental organizations
subsectors.description: NGOs
